channel.title: Adding headhints to pking? [PLEASE READ]
channel.description:
[center]I'm trying to add a headhint to pking, similar to this:
For example, if someone attacks you, a arrow will appear over their head, like in duel arena. I already have the sprite, I just need the code to add. I think it's a pretty good idea, especially when there's a big clan fight, you can tell exactly who's attacking you.
[img]http://www.runesnaps.com/snaps/duelarena.jpg[/img][/center]

item.title: Adding headhints to pking? [PLEASE READ]

item.description:
@iTz_Karma wrote:

[center]I’m trying to add a headhint to pking, similar to this:

For example, if someone attacks you, a arrow will appear over their head, like in duel arena. I already have the sprite, I just need the code to add. I think it’s a pretty good idea, especially when there’s a big clan fight, you can tell exactly who’s attacking you.
